name: Mendigo BattleRoyale
description: In the midst of the covid's chaos, people have no money to donate to the beggars, and that is why the great Mendingo Tournament Battle Tournament was held. Here the beggar who triumphs, will keep all the tip of the viewers and will get a vaccine to not die of covid-19. Be the best beggar in town and face your enemies, or will you be afraid?
